name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm's Deep
name_original: The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm's Deep
description:
The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm's Deep is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Turbine. It was originally released in 2013. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm's Deep is available on PC.
